name: Les Manley Bundle
description:
Les Manley Bundle includes Les Manley in: Lost in L.A. and Les Manley in: Search for the King


Les Manley in: Search for the King He finds his clothes at K-Mart. He finds his dates at Radio Shack. And now he's out to get rich quick by finding the greatest entertainer of all time. Follow mild-mannered Les Manley as he rocks 'n' rolls across America in search of big bucks, beautiful babes and... The King.
Les Manley in: Lost in L.A. IT"S THE CRIME OF THE CENTURY AND ONLY ONE MANLEY CAN SOLVE IT.
Someone is kidnapping the hippest stars in Hollywood. And Les Manley must scour La La Land - sifting through out-of-work actors, rock stars, and gorgeous babes - to unravel the mystery.
